item.title: Elon Musk wants to be a trillionaire — here's how SpaceX may get him there
item.description: Elon Musk's net worth soared past $800 billion this week after he merged SpaceX with xAI in a deal that valued the combined entity at $1.25 trillion.

item.title: Calculating Elon Musk's wealth: Here's what to know
item.description: Elon Musk's net worth potentially blasting off to another world thanks to SpaceX. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

item.title: Family office investment themes: Here's what to know
item.description: We're learning more about what the ultra-wealthy are doing with their money. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with more.
